item.title: Architecture - Virtualized collections
item.description: Virtualized collection enables displaying a scrolling list of data while only instantiating the visible rows. When scrolling, the no longer visible rows are reused and updated with the new data. In Xamarin.Forms, this is done via 2 controls: ListView and CollectionView. Also those controls support grouping data and displaying a group header/footer. My main idea was to let the user pass in its data source and declare a template function (as well as 2 others for header/footer).
